[page 318/642]
    I'd  say  go  with  Vocal  models  only,  if  you  care  about  your  vocal  output.”  The  same  is  vice  versa  for  instrumentals.   -  Older  ensemble  configurations  or  custom  settings  with  lower  SDR  (but  might  be  useful  for  some  specific  songs  or  genres  if  further  info  is  given)   From  public  models,  the  best  SDR  on  14.04.23:   Ensemble  |  Kim  vocal  1  +  Inst  HQ  2  +  Main  427  +  htdemucs_ft  |  Avg/Avg  |  Chunks  Batch  |
